content:
You are correct, I apologize for the mistake in my previous message. The file I provided does not contain 44 notes, but 38 notes.
The melody starts with the E note, followed by the sequence of notes E,F,G,G,G,F,E,D,D,C,G,G,G,F,E,D,D,C,G,C,C,D,E,F,G,G,G,F,E,D,D,C,G

I apologize for any confusion caused. Thank you for bringing this to my attention.
Please let me know if you need any further help.
